snippet.title: Heart Forth, Alicia - Official Kickstarter Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam - https://bit.ly/3nPagdH    |   http://twitter.com/HFAgame   |  
Become a Backer & play the demo: http://hfalicia.com/paypal/ 
Press Kit: http://bit.ly/hfapkit   |   Kickstarter- http://kck.st/Rod8PX 

Heart Forth, Alicia is a '90s-inspired Metroidvania RPG about a young wizard on her journey to stop a Spirit from consuming her homeland. The story unfolds amidst the repercussions of centuries worth of struggle, strife, and bloodshed between cultures, races and worldviews. But above all else, it's an epic Metroidvania RPG that combines timeless 16- and 32-bit gameplay, modern mechanics, and a set of unique, intertwining stories to take you on a fantastic journey.
